titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the constitution of the United States with respect to the right to life.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

term.name: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

bill.summary: 1/22/1987--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Defines "person" to include the unborn for the purpose of the right to life guarantee. Exempts from applicability of this amendment laws permitting medical procedures required to prevent the death of the mother.
